definition: to preserve a proper behavior in private life
careful/cautious
old variant of 慎[shen4]
alone/independent/single/sole/only

sentences.english: Shendu can make for the realization of justice and fairness in social network.
sentences.chinese: 慎独有利于网络社会正义与公平的实现。

sentences.english: The valuable point is in self-controlling and promotion of restricting capability.
sentences.chinese: 贵在慎独，提高自我约束能力。

sentences.english: Objective To train ICU nurses' carefulness trait and improve the quality of nursing.
sentences.chinese: 目的培养ICU护士的慎独精神，提高护理质量。

sentences.english: Network lawmaking is the external guarantee for network individuals to realize Shendu.
sentences.chinese: 网络立法是网络个体实现慎独的外在保障。

sentences.english: In the walk of precipitation calm, do say, Shendu.
sentences.chinese: 在游走中沉淀心静，认真行言，慎独而行。

sentences.english: Fifth, guide network main body's contrition.
sentences.chinese: 其五，引导网络主体不断“内省”和“慎独”。

definition: restrain yourself and return to the rites (idiom, from Analects); to subdue self and observe proprieties/(any number of possible translations)
to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
to conduct oneself in society
self-restraint/discipline/selflessness
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
nobleman/person of noble character
to be strict with oneself (idiom)/to demand a lot of oneself
the way of one's conduct and interaction in society (idiom)
to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else
living a simple life as one's ideal (idiom)
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

definition: to be strict with oneself
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked
pinyin: jun1 zi5 tan3 dang4 dang4 , xiao3 ren2 chang2 qi1 qi1
related.word: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

definition: to be lenient with others (idiom)
to reflect upon oneself/introspection
